patterns: Tell me about Neem tree
What is Neem tree known for?
What are the benefits of Neem tree?
How do you take care of Neem tree?
Describe the Neem tree

responses.description: Neem trees are evergreen and known for their medicinal properties.
responses.maintenance: Minimal maintenance required. Prune once a year to remove dead branches.
responses.planting: Plant in a sunny area with well-drained soil. Water weekly during the initial growth phase.

patterns: How to plant a Mango tree?

How to care for a Mango tree?
What does a Mango tree need to grow?

responses.description: Mango trees are known for their delicious fruits and tropical appeal.
responses.maintenance: Fertilize during the growing season. Protect from pests and diseases.
responses.planting: Plant in sandy loam soil with full sunlight. Water deeply once a week.

Describe a Banyan tree

responses.description: Banyan trees are large with aerial roots and provide excellent shade.
responses.maintenance: Prune excess roots and branches. Water moderately during dry seasons.
responses.planting: Requires a spacious area and well-drained soil. Thrives in tropical climates.

responses.description: Oak trees are known for their sturdy wood and long lifespan.

responses.planting: Plant in well-drained soil with full sunlight. It may take time to establish.

responses.description: Cherry trees are small to medium-sized and known for their sweet fruits.
responses.maintenance: Water deeply and fertilize during the growing season. Prune after fruiting.
responses.planting: Plant in well-drained, fertile soil with full sunlight. Best in temperate climates.

responses.planting: Plant in well-drained, sandy soil with full sunlight.

responses.planting: Plant in well-drained, loamy soil with partial to full sunlight.

responses.planting: Plant in well-drained, acidic soil with partial sunlight.
